author: Anand Sinha
title: Michael Saylor sounds 21-year alarm after amassing $64B in Bitcoin
description: Michael Saylor's Strategy acquired 4,980 BTC between June 23 and June 29.
content:
Michael Saylor sounds 21-year alarm after amassing $64B in Bitcoin originally appeared on TheStreet.
